version_description: Now you are able to check the onboard menu before your flight and you can also pay with Maestro card and gift vouchers in the app!
Now you are able to check the onboard menu before your flight and you can also pay with Maestro card and gift vouchers in the app!
Enjoy the benefits of the upgraded WIZZ Flex service even on your mobile!
Enjoy the benefits of the upgraded WIZZ Flex service even on your mobile!

Wizz Air now offers WIZZ Go option on the mobile apps as well!
A new bundle with our most popular services for a discounted price.

Wizz Air now offers WIZZ Go option on the mobile apps as well!
A new bundle with our most popular services for a discounted price.

Now you can pay by bank transfer in the mobile app!

Now you are able to check your flight’s status in the mobile application! From now on the mobile application is also available in French and Dutch!

New features: Secure your best fare for 48 hours with our Fare Lock also in the mobile application! Moreover, you can enjoy family discounts if you travel with your children!

We have also enhanced the timeline which accompanies and helps you throughout your journey – from the moment of the booking, till your arrival to your destination. Now you can add your flights to calendar and book your preferred seat easily, via the timeline.

New features: Secure your best fare for 48 hours with our Fare Lock also in the mobile application! Moreover, you can enjoy family discounts if you travel with your children!

We have also enhanced the timeline which accompanies and helps you throughout your journey – from the moment of the booking, till your arrival to your destination. Now you can add your flights to calendar and book your preferred seat easily, via the timeline.

New features: Now you can change passengers' basic info like name or gender from the application directly!
We have also enhanced the timeline functionalities with integrated flight status to track the departure of your journey and updates of the arrival time from the home screen

New features: Now you can change passengers' basic info like name or gender from the application directly!
We have also enhanced the timeline functionalities with integrated flight status to track the departure of your journey and updates of the arrival time from the home screen

New features:
From now on you can change your flights on the go, easily, in your app! Moreover, we renewed the in-app boarding cards, where now you can reach all the important information more easily than ever.

With this update, we've released a couple of usability improvements and corrected some minor errors as well.
Help us improving Wizz Air App by telling us what you think. You can reach us directly on wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

With this update, we've released a couple of usability improvements and corrected some minor errors as well.
Help us improving Wizz Air App by telling us what you think. You can reach us directly on wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

New features: From now on you can check the weather of your destination in the Timeline! Be the first on board: purchase WIZZ Priority for passengers individually. Not sure who to travel with? Choose Flexible travel partner and make the decision later.

In this update, we've released a couple of usability improvements and corrected some minor errors as well.

Help us improving Wizz Air App by sending feedback to wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

New Features: In order to provide the local feel, you can now change the currency wherever you want during booking, and we added Serbian as a new language. We strive to always ensure you know about our novelties: look for the mark “New” to find new routes and features.
In this update, we've released a couple of usability improvements and corrected some minor errors as well.
Help us improving Wizz Air App by sending feedback to wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

New features: We strive to provide our users more convenience. Have you forgotten anything? Now you can add services, even during check-in! Have your boarding card automatically downloaded after you check-in on your app, so you can focus more on your journey.
In this update, we've released a couple of usability improvements and corrected some minor errors as well.
All feedback is welcome at wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

New features: We strive to provide our users more convenience. Have you forgotten anything? Now you can add services, even during check-in! Have your boarding card automatically downloaded after you check-in on your app, so you can focus more on your journey.
In this update, we've released a couple of usability improvements and corrected some minor errors as well.
All feedback is welcome at wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

New feature: Now you can use our App in Norwegian language to book your flights, add services and check-in!
Furthermore in this update, we've released a couple of usability improvements and corrected some minor errors as well.
Help us improve our app by sending feedback to wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

Reaching your destination has never been this easy! Now you can choose the airport transfer option that best suits your needs! Also, if you are travelling with your friends or family, you can share the boarding cards with your travel partners!
Help us improve the Wizz Air App by sending feedback to wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

New features: Try our new flight selector that gives you a better overview on our bundles and their benefits. You can now add Security Fast Track and Exclusive Lounge services, even up to 3 hours before departure time, to get through security check quickly and enjoy a bit of extra comfort before your flight. You can also choose WIZZ Priority while already at the airport. New language: Macedonian. We also fixed issues affecting iPhone 5 devices. Contact us to help improve our app: wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com

New features:
It’s now possible to choose the fare and baggage size options that best suit your needs. Also, receive specific seat recommendations for you and your travelling companions when booking your flight.
Help us improve our app by sending feedback to: wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com

Do you want to save more on checked-in luggage, seat selection and on priority boarding even after purchasing your ticket? From now on you have the opportunity to buy our most popular services in one great bundle: upgrade to WIZZ Go even after your booking!

Pass a great time while booking with us, check our new, fresh loading screen as well!

Help us improving Wizz Air App by sending feedback to wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

Do you want to save more on checked-in luggage, seat selection and on priority boarding even after purchasing your ticket? From now on you have the opportunity to buy our most popular services in one great bundle: upgrade to WIZZ Go even after your booking!

Pass a great time while booking with us, check our new, fresh loading screen as well!

Help us improving Wizz Air App by sending feedback to wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.
From now on, after check-in, you can still change your travel document if you logged in. Help us improve the Wizz Air App by sending feedback to wizzappfeedback@wizzair.com.

To make things more relaxing for you while you’re getting ready to travel, we now offer you several new services: FLIGHT CANCELLATION, lets you cancel your flight in advance and even get a refund back to your WIZZ Account; AIRPORT PARKING service allows you to reserve your parking place directly. Help us to improve the WIZZ App by sending us your feedback on these new options to wizzairappfeedback.com.
